name: Farmers & Mechanics Bank v. Aspinwall-Delafield Co., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Farmers & Mechanics Bank v. Aspinwall-Delafield Co.

judges: Before Beown, C. J., Moschziskee, Feazee, Walling and Kephaet, JJ.
parties: Farmers & Mechanics Bank v. Aspinwall-Delafield Co., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
This appeal was heard in connection with that taken by the appellant to October Term, 1919, No. 7, in which the Greensburg Title & Trust Company was the appellee [266 Pa. 160]. The same question is involved in each appeal, and the affirmance of tbe judgment in the first is controlling in the second.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Farmers & Mechanics Bank v. Aspinwall-Delafield Co., Appellant.
Argued October 21, 1919.
Appeal, No. 127, Oct. T., 1919, by defendant, from judgment of C. P. Allegheny Co., on verdict for plaintiff in case of Farmers & Mechanics Bank v. Aspinwall-Delafield Co.
Before Beown, C. J., Moschziskee, Feazee, Walling and Kephaet, JJ.
Affirmed.
March 8, 1920:
